title: Interactive Telling Time Pro
description:
“This bright and cheery app... includes games and friendly voice overs.” - “Handy skills to teach your kids.”
 -- The Australian 

- 2012 Parents' Choice Silver Award winner - Parents' Choice Foundation 

- Selected by Apple as iPhone App of the Week in Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Overall New & Noteworthy in France, China

- Discover an easy and fun way to learn analog/digital clocks. 

- Learn to tell the time in different languages! Multiple languages all recorded by native speakers (English, French, Spanish, Japanese, German, Swedish, Russian, Dutch, Portuguese, Norwegian, Danish, Korean, Chinese and Italian).

"a thorough, well thought out approach to learning and practicing the art of telling time" -- www.theiphonemom.com 

- Includes 9 beautifully hand drawn interactive clocks that comes with movable hour and minutes hands especially designed for small fingers! 
 
This app was made for you by artists and educators, with the help from school teachers and mother’s groups to bring you the best app in learning to tell the time for young beginners. We understand the many challenges faced by parents when explaining concepts to young children and that is why Interactive Telling Time balances the need for learning with fun and interactive games.

Interactive Telling Time is great for kids from ages 3 to 12 and comes in 5 difficulty levels so that it helps kids master telling time progressively (statistics is provided to help keep track of your child’s progress).

Beautifully illustrated with many adorable clock designs and accompanied by encouraging voice-overs and cheerful background music, this app creates a kid-friendly environment to enhance their learning experience.

Interactive Telling Time Features:

Universal App:
- Universal app for iPad/iPhone/iPod Touch.

Educational:
- Learn to set the time via Interactive clocks with movable hour and minute hand!
- Learn to read a clock/to tell time.
- Learn conversion between analog clock and digital clock
- Learn the concept of day and night.
- Learn how to use AM/PM, 12 hour and 24 hour clock notation.
- Quiz Mode (Learn concepts such as ‘o’clock‘, ‘midnight’, ‘half past’, ‘quarter past’, ‘quarter to’, ‘past’, ‘to’, etc.)
- Designed for kids aged 3-12! 5 difficulty levels to choose from.
- A score board to keep track of kid’s progress
- Tutorials for young learners.
- Virtual Aquarium reward - Your kids will want to play to try to win all the rewards!

Beautifully designed interface:
- 9 Beautifully Hand Drawn Interactive Clock including:
+ Simple Teaching Clock (crisp indicators to make it simple and easy)
+ Lion Clock,
+ Train Clock,
+ Aquarium Clock,
+ Moon Clock,
+ Flower Clock,
+ Gears Clock, 
+ Owl Clock and
+ Seven Wonders Clock!
- Creatively designed animated rotating earth which alternates between sunrise, noon, sunset, and night backgrounds.
- Easy to use interface specifically designed for young learners

Additional Fun Games with educational values:
- Stop The Clock -  A fun and exciting game designed with an educational focus. With the clock minutes hand ticking, kids will have to stop the clock as per quiz question (for example, Stop the clock at 9:45!).
- Clock Puzzle - help kids learn the positions and use of all clock components such as digits, hour hand and minute hand.
- Discover time at your own pace in our new Explore Time play mode!

* Still undecided? Try our lite version for FREE!
Just search for “Interactive Telling Time Lite” in the App Store

title: KMPlayer+ Divx Codec
description:
▶ KMPlayer Plus (Divx Codec) officially support Divx codec.
Please check up codec which is not supported.

[ Supported codec ]
Avi File : DXMF, DX50, DIVX, DIV4, DIV3, MP4V
MKV File : DX50, DIV3, DIVX, DIV4, MP4V

[ Not supported codec ]
DTS, EAC3, TrueHD
eac3, mlp, trhd, dts, dts, dtsb, dtsc, dtse, dtsh, dtsl, ms

[ Supported Subtitle Format ]
DVD, DVB, SSA/ASS Subtitle Track.
SubStation Alpha(.ssa/.ass) with full styling.SAMI(.smi) with ruby tag support.
SubRip(.srt), MicroDVD(.sub/.txt), VobSub(.sub/.idx), SubViewer2.0(.sub), MPL2(.mpl/.txt), TMPlayer(.txt), Teletext, PJS(.pjs) , WebVTT(.vtt)


▶ Function for KMPlayer Plus (Divx Codec)

Media Player Function
Bookmark : Bookmark on your wanted position to play.
High definition video playback: HD, 4K, 8K, UHD, Full HD playback.
Color adjustment: change brightness, contrast, hue, saturation, gamma information
Zoom in video: Zoom in and move the video you're watching
Section repeat: Repeat after section designation
Invert video: Invert left and right (mirror mode), upside down
Quick Button: Select and specify player options with one click
Equalizer: Use equalizer for music and video
Speed control: Playback speed control function up to 0.25 ~ 4 times
Beautiful UI: beautiful music and video playback UI
Subtitle Setting: Change subtitle color, size, position
Timer function: Video and music timer function

Other Functions
Search function: Search music and video you want
My List (Playlist): Create video and music playlist
Play URL: Play any video on web by entering a URL (Streaming)
Network: Private server connection by FTP, UPNP, SMB
Cloud: Play music and content within Google Drive


▶ Access Permission Information

Selectable Permission
Storage: Request for access to photos, music, and videos stored on the device
View and download Google Drive files: Request permission to use the cloud
* You can use the basic service even if you do not agree with the selectable permission. 
(However, functions that require selectable permission cannot be used.)

title: Maths Chat, my robot teacher
description:
Meet Botty, the first maths robot teacher.
He will patiently help your child learn his times tables.

The app works as an interactive chat.
Botty dialogs with the user and asks him maths facts.

The child can choose which times tables he would like to train.

Ideal for kids from 7 to 11.

Functionalities:
- interactive chat
- a patient and always ready teacher
- history of all the games
- training for the 4 operations: addition, multiplication, subtraction, division
- the app does not require an internet connection

Maths Chat is the latest educational app from the creator of AB Maths.

See our other apps at:
www.ab-math-games.com
